H0.text: Congo, Sensation, President Grevy and Beauty of Moscow are all varieties of which garden plant. Peony

H1.text: Congo, Sensation, President Grevy and Beauty of Moscow are all varieties of which garden plant. Rose

H2.text: Congo, Sensation, President Grevy and Beauty of Moscow are all varieties of which garden plant. Dahlia

H3.text: Congo, Sensation, President Grevy and Beauty of Moscow are all varieties of which garden plant. Lilac

A4.text: The majority of ornamental roses are hybrids that were bred for their flowers.

A5.text: Roses are a popular crop for both domestic and commercial cut flowers.
